Uses of Interface
org.hibernate.event.spi.EntityCopyObserverFactory

Packages that use EntityCopyObserverFactory
Package
Description
org.hibernate.engine.spi
This package defines some central internal SPI abstractions used throughout the implementation of Hibernate.
org.hibernate.event.internal
This package defines a default set of event listeners that implement the default behaviors of Hibernate session operations.
org.hibernate.internal
An internal package containing implementations of central Hibernate APIs, mostly defined in org.hibernate.
